html:
11.12.20  6:12 pm   Random question: on a scale of 0/10 how creative do you rate yourself?

      i don't rate myself. i would find that both corrupt and distracting

11.12.20  5:33 pm   is your music about something or nothing?

      ideally it can be about everything, but i'll admit that might seem kind of greedy

11.12.20  5:10 pm   Why do you like doing music the way you do it?

     i'm willing to do it any way i can

     Also what is your favorite video by you if you have one

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.12.20  4:04 pm   How do you make it past the post beginning part of learning a new skill where it feels like you know nothing? I've found myself quitting too many projects after a few days.

      i guess it depends on how badly you want it

11.12.20  3:14 pm   hey bill, What time signature is "violence" in ball & stick?

      according to my calculations, 13/16

11.12.20  2:51 pm   How to get a music

      go to sleep / wake up

11.12.20  2:50 pm   Where do you get creativity from? 

      from the atmosphere, and/or lithosphere

11.12.20  2:06 pm   Do you put deeper meanings into your songs consciously,

     the deeper the meaning, the less concious you'd have to be about putting it there

     or do you just write what feels right for the song?

     yes

11.12.20  1:52 pm   How does one survive?

      touch the sky

11.12.20  12:43 pm   is your mental health doing alright? :(

      yes. thank you for your generous frown

11.12.20  11:55 am   will you celebrate christmas? will you release anyhting related to christmas?

      if all goes well i will do christmas themed material for the majority of the year leading up to the following christmas. or at least i will have that option, knock on wood

11.12.20  11:53 am   What is the theory of theory

      actually being there

11.12.20  11:34 am   musical inspirations?

      everything

11.12.20  10:35 am   Why are you so good at writing music? Your music is the best music I have ever heard in my life.

      holy itemized daily meal plan, you are very friendly

11.12.20  10:16 am   Do you have a strong opinion on anything?

      i have a strong opinion of everything

11.12.20  8:19 am   Thoughts on existence?

      could come in handy

11.12.20  7:53 am   Do you think the future will be more individualistic or communitarian? Would you prefer one or the other?

      best of both worlds. everyone merges into 1 communal individual. and if that gets boring, can try splitting into a community of individuals. get a little role play going

11.12.20  7:31 am   Should i just memorize chords now?

     no

     I'm confused on what to learn for the road to make music after learning the basic concepts.

      take the songs you enjoy, and start trying to find ways to perform them, in whole or in part. sometimes a secret ingredient is a little bit of singing. that is sometimes a great way to bridge the song and the instrument

11.12.20  7:01 am   Hey bill what to do if you can't fall asleep and you have school in 4 hours

      this is what i would do. set 5 of your most robust alarms, for scattered times within a 35 minute range of when you must wake up. then, lie in bed and reflect deeply on what you think may happen the following day, and how you could play a role in making the day the best it can be

11.12.20  5:44 am   Does pizza belong on pineapple 

      that is its one true home

11.12.20  5:30 am   Why do you make sense to me?

      perhaps i remind you of other things that make sense

11.12.20  5:10 am   Any Christmas gift recommendations? 

      how about a tree

11.12.20  4:48 am   Opinions on the big bang?

      the big bang is an average sized bang. it is called the big bang, for branding purposes

11.12.20  3:15 am   What is your favorite video you have ever made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.12.20  3:10 am   Would you apply your advice for creating music to creating any art in general? 

      some of it

11.12.20  2:41 am   Hey, I really like your music and my morning routine consists of getting up, starting the shower, and telling my google home to play bill wurtz. I have a question about the line from 'might quit' that goes 'do you remember the day we pretended to be every star in the sky'. Does this have anything to do with 'history of the entire world, i guess'?

     no

     I know it probably doesn't but it's an interesting idea i guess and i wanted to hear what you thought.

     it's a weak line. it's lyrically too weak, and chordally too deep. so it's out of balance, and in retrospect i certainly could have done better

11.12.20  2:05 am   do you have some top songs? my favs are slow down, sexy pants, at the airport terminal, and all the rest.

      i'm going to be making some of the top ones in the future

11.12.20  2:03 am   So..... What's next for your creation?
Give some teeny tiny clue please?

      i have a lot of songs, and a lot of videos to do. need to optimize the process so it is sustainable enough to deliver all of that content

11.12.20  1:39 am   Are you sentient?

      oh that would explain a lot

11.12.20  12:59 am   are you going to make a new video?

      that sounds like not enough videos

11.11.20  11:55 pm   How are you so funny?

      that could be due to the extreme levels of normalcy i have cultivated

11.11.20  11:42 pm   Is there any limit to our ability to be weak?

      yes

11.11.20  11:13 pm   Is nothing something 

      now that you mention it

11.11.20  10:57 pm   what are current estimates on how many times somebody has asked whens your next song?

      1 or 2

11.11.20  10:01 pm   I have listened to your songs as background music for a few days now and it's permanently running through my head whether I'm listening or not. Is this good?

      it's normal, but if you don't like it you can listen to other music for a while and that will replace it

11.11.20  9:59 pm   What is your next video? 

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

11.11.20  9:24 pm   Are you proud of your what you make?

      we'll see

11.11.20  8:43 pm   What is your idea

      so far i've had more than 1

11.11.20  8:11 pm   What's the most important thing in life?

      time

11.11.20  6:35 pm   How do you re-learn to feel? Im having a little trouble with it and its causing me trouble.

      try moving, not moving, and different combinations of moving and not moving. that should get you started

11.11.20  6:22 pm   what should I draw?

      the world you know or have imagined

11.11.20  5:40 pm   How do you come up with the specific lyrics in your videos?

      with music

11.11.20  5:37 pm   How to make 3d animation,Bill?

      stay calm

11.11.20  4:49 pm   What do you do when bored and unmotivated but still want to make something?

      have a board room meeting about what you think you wish the nature of that thing would be

11.11.20  4:22 pm   What are you working on right now?

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

11.11.20  4:16 pm   i'm someone who wants to become a musician, but a lot of the subjects my music teacher teaches me seems pointless in making and performing music (sight reading, intervals, etc.).  are these topics actually important in making music?

      not if you don't enjoy it

11.11.20  4:10 pm   Whats your favourite type of music.

      normal

11.11.20  3:47 pm   What is a good way to get out of creative low points?

      if you rotate everything, then the low point will be in a higher position

11.11.20  2:52 pm   How do you come up with your video ideas?

      basically i take a trip through the gutter and then into the sewer

11.11.20  2:39 pm   Why are people so Stupid 

      due to intelligence
